Waterlooville Restaurants & Dining Guide

Discover the best Waterlooville restaurants, cafes, pubs and takeaways. From Chinese and Indian to fish & chips, McDonalds, Dominos and Wetherspoons. Complete dining guide.

Waterlooville has a diverse dining scene offering everything from traditional British pubs to international cuisine, cafes, and fast food chains.

🍽️

Waterlooville Town Centre

Central dining hub with a mix of restaurants, cafes, and traditional pubs

📍London Road and Hambledon Road area
🅿️Free parking available nearby
✨Vibrant mix of casual dining and traditional British pubs

Featured Restaurants

The Red Lion

££

Traditional Pub • British

Historic pub serving classic British dishes and local ales

Features: Real ales, traditional pub food, outdoor seating
Sunday RoastFish & ChipsSteak & Ale Pie
📅 Walk-ins welcome, table reservations recommended weekends

Café Rouge

£££

Bistro • French

French bistro with classic dishes and wine selection

Features: French wines, outdoor terrace, family-friendly
Croque MonsieurBoeuf BourguignonCrème Brûlée
📅 Table reservations recommended
🍽️

Wellington Retail Park

Modern dining options with chain restaurants and family-friendly venues

📍Wellington Way, near major retailers
🅿️Free parking available
✨Family-friendly with quick service options

Cuisine Types Available

Chinese

Authentic Chinese cuisine with both traditional and modern dishes

Popular Dishes:
Sweet & Sour ChickenChow MeinDuck Pancakes
Price Range: ££
Dietary: Vegetarian and vegan options available

Indian

Spice-rich Indian cuisine with regional specialties

Popular Dishes:
Chicken Tikka MasalaLamb BiryaniVegetable Curry
Price Range: ££
Dietary: Extensive vegetarian menu, gluten-free options

Fish & Chips

Traditional British fish and chips with locally caught fish

Popular Dishes:
Cod & ChipsHaddock & ChipsFish Pie
Price Range: ££
Dietary: Gluten-free batter available at some locations

Italian

Authentic Italian cuisine with fresh pasta and wood-fired pizzas

Popular Dishes:
Margherita PizzaSpaghetti CarbonaraTiramisu
Price Range: ££
Dietary: Vegetarian pizzas, gluten-free pasta options

💡Dining Tips

  • •Best for families: Pizza Express, McDonald's, and most pubs
  • •Romantic dining: Café Rouge, Number 73 Bar and Kitchen
  • •Quick lunch: McDonald's, local cafes, sandwich shops
  • •Sunday lunch: The Red Lion, The Bird in Hand
  • •Takeaway options: Most restaurants offer collection and delivery
  • •Dietary requirements: Most restaurants accommodate vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free diets

📅Booking Information

advance Booking

Recommended for popular restaurants, especially weekends

walk Ins

Most pubs and casual dining accept walk-ins

online Booking

Many restaurants offer online booking via their websites

phone Booking

Traditional phone booking available at all restaurants

Community Reviews

About Waterlooville Restaurants & Dining Guide

Waterlooville has a diverse dining scene offering everything from traditional British pubs to international cuisine, cafes, and fast food chains. Whether you're a long-time resident or new to the area, this comprehensive guide helps you discover everything Waterlooville has to offer.

Located in Hampshire with postcodes PO7 and PO8, Waterlooville serves a population of over 60,000 residents with excellent facilities, shops, services, and community amenities. The town centre (PO7 3DU) and retail park provide convenient access to major retailers and local businesses.

For more information about specific businesses and services, browse our complete directory or search by category to find exactly what you need in Waterlooville.
